4 COVID 19 Dashboard for Balkan countries* Here you go directly to the dashboard 4.1 Data # Github covid19_confirmed_git <-"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/master/csse_covid_19_data/csse_covid_19_time_series/time_series_covid19_confirmed_global.csv" covid19_confirmed_git <- read_csv(url(covid19_confirmed_git)) # Worldometer codivid19_all <- "https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/" main_table <- codivid19_all%>% xml2::read_html()%>% html_nodes(xpath='//*[@id="main_table_countries_today"]') %>% html_table() main_table <- as.data.frame(main_table) 4.2 Curve of confirmed cases The graph shows the number of confirmed cases by the last date shown.Updates daily at around 23:59 UTC. 4.3 Deaths vs Recovered The bar chart shows the total number of recovered people in comparison to the total number of death cases. Updates daily at around 23:59 UTC. 4.4 Total cases vs new cases The bar chart shows the total number of cases in comparison to the number of new cases being constantly reported. 4.5 Hospitalization 4.5.1 Croatia 4.5.2 Slovenia 4.5.3 Austria
